name: Big Black Hungry Cat
description:
USE HEADPHONES AND GO FULLSCREEN

Trapped in a world without light- you stumble through a deep, endlessly generated valley with only a synthesized voice to guide you. Use the microphone to move or listen to your surroundings.

A Big Black Hungry Cat is hunting you.

Commands: 

  • "North" or "Up" or "Go North" Go north
  • "West" or "Left" or "Go West" Go west
  • "East" or "Right" or "Go East" Go east
  • "South" or "Down" or "Go Down" Go down
  • "Listen" Listen to your surroundings

Mud = Mud slows you down

Storms = Storms make it impossible to listen to anything
